attributes.action: support our military personnel, who are giving their lives for our country and pay compensation which is adequate to support their medical (physical and mental) and social needs for injuries sustained in service and for subsequent complications that may arise at a later date. Also to include a percentage that will support their families in the standard of living that would have been achieved if they were to able to  remain employed in service . That the ministers making these decisions to oppose the Court Judgement, face the public and not hide behind the lawyers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
